/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/clang++ --target=x86_64-apple-darwin -O3 -DNDEBUG -miphoneos-version-min=9.0 -fms-extensions  -stdlib=libc++ -arch x86_64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator11.3.sdk -dynamiclib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  -o mediastreamer2.framework/mediastreamer2 -install_name @rpath/mediastreamer2.framework/mediastreamer2
